words.word_translated: Struggle (noun) - a situation in which someone finds it difficult to succeed.
words.sentence: Ik heb een struggle met het leren van Nederlands.
words.sentence_translated: I have a struggle with learning Dutch.

words.sentence: Mijn mam helpt me bij mijn struggle met het leren van Nederlands.
words.sentence_translated: My mom helps me with my struggle to learn Dutch.

words.word_translated: Pak (verb) - to grab or take hold of something.
words.sentence: Ik pak mijn boek en ga leren Nederlands.
words.sentence_translated: I grab my book and go learn Dutch.

words.word_translated: Vasthouden (verb) - to hold on or keep something firmly in one's grasp.
words.sentence: Hij pakt zijn telefoon en houdt het vast tijdens de busreis.
words.sentence_translated: He grabs his phone and holds it tightly during the bus ride.

words.sentence: Ik wil ook anderen helpen bij hun struggle met Nederlands.
words.sentence_translated: I also want to help others with their struggle in Dutch.

words.word_translated: Welkom (adjective) - welcome, a feeling of being accepted or invited.
words.sentence: Anderen zijn welkom om mee te leren Nederlands.
words.sentence_translated: Others are welcome to learn Dutch with us.

words.word_translated: Gatver (noun) - an exclamation of frustration or annoyance, similar to 'damn'.
words.sentence: Ik zeg gatver als ik mijn boek verlies tijdens het leren.
words.sentence_translated: I say 'gatver' when I lose my book while learning.

words.word_translated: Wizard (noun) - a person who is very skilled or talented at something.
words.sentence: Een Nederlands wizard kan makkelijk praten in de taal.
words.sentence_translated: A Dutch wizard can easily speak the language.

words.word_translated: Uittrekken (verb) - to pull out or extract something from a place.
words.sentence: De wizard pakt zijn pen en trekt het uit de tas.
words.sentence_translated: The wizard grabs his pen and pulls it out of the bag.

words.word_translated: Praten (verb) - to talk or converse with someone.
words.sentence: Ik wil praten met anderen om mijn Nederlands te verbeteren.
words.sentence_translated: I want to talk with others to improve my Dutch.
